ai.summary: A short, easy 4.7 km hike around Great Binfield in the Basingstoke area. Suitable for families and casual walkers seeking a relaxed countryside route with farmland and light woodland.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently rolling paths, well-marked and suitable for beginners. Mix of farmland tracks and light woodland; expect occasional gates and possible mud after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for 4.7 km on public paths. Wear sturdy footwear and dress for the weather. Stay on marked paths, close gates, and watch for livestock. Bring a map or GPS, water, and a small first-aid kit. In winter or after rain, paths can be muddy and slippery; be cautious on stiles and uneven ground.
recommended_gear: Comfortable walking shoes or light hiking boots
Phone with emergency contacts and power bank
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; spring and autumn are particularly pleasant.

seo.title: Great Binfield 4.7 km Easy Hike – Basingstoke, UK
seo.meta_description: Explore a 4.7 km easy hike around Great Binfield near Basingstoke, UK. Flat paths through farmland and woodland; ideal for families and casual walkers.
